title: Tailscale achieves AWS Networking Competency

summary:
We must learn to:

Live in it
Live on it
Navigate it
Surf it
Swim in it
Sail on it
Dive in it
Understand it
Love it
Cherish it
Embrace it

But, above all, don’t drown in it
title: Life is an Ocean

summary:

title: The beauty of blogging
